testcase.name: creation succesfull with correct username and password
can login with succesfully generated account
creation fails with correct username and too short password

failure.message: Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered

testcase.failure:
Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered
scenario creation fails with correct username and too short password given command new user is selected when a valid username and too short password are entered then new user is not be registered to system

testcase.name: creation fails with correct username and password consisting of letters

failure.message: Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered

testcase.failure:
Step "new user is not be registered to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >] doesn't contain new user not registered
scenario creation fails with correct username and password consisting of letters given command new user is selected when a valid username and password consisting of letters are entered then new user is not be registered to system

testcase.name: creation fails with too short username and valid pasword
creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword
can not login with account that is not succesfully created

failure.message: Step "new credentials do not allow logging in to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >, username:, password:, logged in, >] should not contain logged in

testcase.failure:
Step "new credentials do not allow logging in to system" -- [>, username:, password:, new user registered, >, username:, password:, logged in, >] should not contain logged in
scenario can not login with account that is not succesfully created given command new user is selected when a invalid username/password are entered then new credentials do not allow logging in to system
